label: Princess Prep Back Window 5
description:
As John scans all around the window, he notices a corner brick seems loose.
After prying it away from the building, he uses it to smash in a pane of glass.
He reaches around carefully and undoes the latch, and slides open the window.
He climbs through to face a basic office desk, and a couple of plants to his left and right.
One of the plants seems to be shuddering of it's own accord.

Hit 1 to continue.

Hit 0 to quit.
